name: Ultraman: Legend of Heroes
description: Ultraman: Legendary Heroes is a 3D action mobile game, officially licensed by Tsuburaya Productions Japan, based on the Japanese classic tokusatsu science fiction series "Ultraman". The classic ultra heroes are all included in the game. Every character's model, actions, skills, and voices were created strictly following the original scenes, so you can enjoy the original Ultraman story. Also, you can immerse yourself in a real and magnificent world of Ultraman. You will feel the excitement when you are exploring this charming world.
developers: 乐堂动漫信息技术有限公司
